curam.util.workflow.impl
Class TaskHistoryAdmin

java.lang.Object
  curam.util.workflow.base.TaskHistoryAdmin
      curam.util.workflow.impl.TaskHistoryAdmin
All Implemented Interfaces:
curam.util.workflow.intf.TaskHistoryAdmin
public abstract class TaskHistoryAdmin
extends curam.util.workflow.base.TaskHistoryAdmin

The TaskHistory entity stores details of the lifecycle events that occur for a Task. This API provides functions to manipulate the data on the TaskHistory and its functions should be used rather than direct access to the functions present on the actual entity.

Method Detail

create

public long create(long taskID,
                   DateTime changeDateTime,
                   java.lang.String changeType,
                   java.lang.String comments,
                   java.lang.String newValue,
                   java.lang.String oldValue,
                   java.lang.String userName)
            throws AppException,
                   InformationalException
Creates a task history record for the specified task and for the specified task history change type.

Parameters:
taskID - The unique identifier of the task.
changeDateTime - The date and time that the task life cycle event occurred.
changeType - The type of change associated with this task history record.
comments - A comment on the change made to the task.
newValue - The new value of the task item being modified.
oldValue - The old value of the task item being modified.
userName - The user making the change to the task.
Returns:
The unique identifier of the newly created task history record.
Throws:
AppException - Exceptions that may occur when creating a new task history record.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

read

public TaskHistoryInfo read(long taskHistoryID)
                     throws AppException,
                            InformationalException
Returns the details of the specified task history record.

Parameters:
taskHistoryID - The unique identifier of the task history record whose details will be returned.
Returns:
The details of the specified task history record.
Throws:
AppException - ID_TASK_HISTORY_DOES_NOT_EXIST - if Task History with specified identifier does not exist.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

searchByTaskIDOrderByChangeDateTimeLast

public TaskHistoryInfoList searchByTaskIDOrderByChangeDateTimeLast(long taskID)
                                                            throws AppException,
                                                                   InformationalException
Returns a list of all the task history records associated with the specified task. In this case, the records returned are ordered by change date time, latest first.

Parameters:
taskID - The unique identifier of the task whose task history details will be returned.
Returns:
A list of all the task history records associated with the specified task. In this case, the records returned are ordered by change date time, latest first.
Throws:
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

searchByTaskIDOrderByChangeDateTimeFirst

public TaskHistoryInfoList searchByTaskIDOrderByChangeDateTimeFirst(long taskID)
                                                             throws AppException,
                                                                    InformationalException
Returns a list of all the task history records associated with the specified task. In this case, the records returned are ordered by change date time, earliest first.

Parameters:
taskID - The unique identifier of the task whose task history details will be returned.
Returns:
A list of all the task history records associated with the specified task. In this case, the records returned are ordered by change date time, earliest first.
Throws:
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
